title: [Question] Is attendance adjusted after branch change?
content:
I am changing my branch in 3rd sem. The counselling is on 14th. We will be 2 weeks behind from other students. I have a few doubts.

1. Do the classes start from scratch?

2. How are the new sections decided?

3. Is the attendance shifted to other branch coz I am attending most of my current classes.

comments.body: Your attendance will start from the day they tell u to report to ur new class. Everything before that will be considered as if there was no clg itself.

I have few questiobs asw, do we really have to attend the counselling procedure at rr campus, afaik they will automatically allot the seat to us right? I mean do we have to be there to accept the seat or something? And what abt the people who have already taken hostel in the other campus
Like where and when we have to ask them for the section do we want?? During counseling itself in auditorium or after that in office or somewhere
They wont Allocate automatically. U have to be there. Idk about hostel but when u go for finalizing the change to the hod u can ask.

When they call for counselling there will be a guy on excel and the list of all students highest cpga first will be displayed. In order they will call and ask what u want. The dude there will change the seat numbers live.
If we don't end up taking a seat, we continue with regular attendance stats in our regular classrooms right?
